snippet: Stephen J. Harper, the Canadian prime minister, took nine years to research, write and publish “A Great Game,” a new addition to the great volume of hockey books produced by Canada.
abstract: Canadian Prime Minister Stephen J Harper took nine years to research, write and publish A Great Game, new addition to the great volume of hockey books produced by Canada;  tome is a 320-page scholarly history of an obscure period in Toronto hockey more than a century ago, with footnotes and bibliography.
lead_paragraph: Stephen J. Harper, the Canadian prime minister, took nine years to research, write and publish “A Great Game,” a new addition to the great volume of hockey books produced by Canada.

headline.main: Hockey History, as Documented by Prime Minister
headline.print_headline:
Hockey History,
As Documented
By Prime Minister
